About Me

I'm a detail-oriented and versatile early-career professional with a strong foundation in product management, AI language models, data analysis, and digital education. With hands-on experience in cross-functional collaboration, UX research, and behavioural analytics, I bring a user-first mindset and a strategic approach to building and improving digital tools.

A recent graduate of the University of Manchester with an MSc in Innovation Management and Entrepreneurship, I have applied my academic and technical background to roles in fintech, AI, higher education, and edtech. I'm driven by a passion for digital transformation, data-led decision-making, and inclusive, human-centred technology.

Education

University of Manchester, UK

Dec 2024 • Distinction (70%)

Dissertation: "Validating the desirability and feasibility of AI avatars in business schools"

Key modules: Innovation Analysis (R), High-Tech Entrepreneurship, Research Methods

BSc Economics and Management in ICT

Tashkent University of Information Technologies, Uzbekistan

Jun 2022 • GPA: 4.46/5.0

Dissertation: "E-commerce in Business Organisation: Case Study of Amazon"

Technical modules: Python, Web Programming, Databases, Project Management

Professional Experience

Jun - Jul 2025

Product Manager Intern

Cur8 Capital, London, UK

Conducted user research on KYC/EDD workflows and designed fintech features. Built dashboards in Metabase to extract behavioural insights. Drafted product briefs and collaborated in agile sprints and roadmap discussions.

AI / LLM Reviewer

Outlier, Scale AI (Freelance)

Evaluated AI-generated responses, ensuring accuracy and clarity. Trained LLMs using domain expertise in economics and finance.

Validated and cleaned multilingual (Uzbek/Russian/English) data. Used Excel and Freshdesk to manage data workflows for global university rankings.

Learning & Development Coordinator / English Teacher

Cambridge Learning Centre, Tashkent

Led redesign of training programmes for teachers. Taught 200+ students using communicative approaches.

Jan 2021 - Dec 2021

Programming Instructor

CODDY Coding School, Tashkent

Taught HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and computer science basics to children and adults. Designed age-specific curricula with a 90% student satisfaction rate.

Career Aspirations

I aim to remain within product ownership and grow into a strategic product role, working on data-driven, user-centric platforms that drive impact and accessibility. I'm passionate about contributing to digital transformation initiatives across sectors like fintech, education, and legal tech.
